value:
I've made countless kimonos in my
time, but I never imagined I would
one day make my own bridal attire.

I hope my mother and father can see
me right now...from on high.

Garments like these are for brides
on their wedding days. A special
occasion calls for a special outfit.

Look, Hinata's fixed up his hair
for once! It's usually so long and
scraggly.

No, of course I'm not marrying the
Demon King! Don't joke about things
like that!

Wow, this would be a perfect spot for
a honeymoon! ...Ah, why did I come
here again?$k$pOh, right! I came to pass along
$Nf's regards!
This bodes well for my future!
I will stride proudly down the aisle!

Ah, there's a tear in my kimono.
I'll have to mend it.

I will learn to be a good partner, and
a good hero.

I'm Oboro of Hoshido, and I'm
dressed as a bride for the festival!
Do you think I pull off the look?

This might seem like it's coming
out of nowhere, but, um...are you
wed, $Nu?$k$pI was trying on wedding outfits, and I
got to thinking about marriage. Seems
like such a big decision.$k$pI mean, your whole life changes!
And what's more, THEIR whole life
changes! It's not as simple as a crush.$k$pYou can have crushes left and right,
no problem! Marriage, on the other
hand, is so...permanent!$k$pI'm just dressing up as a bride today,
but if I ever become the real thing,
it has to be with the right person.
たあっ
はいっ
きゃあっ
何すんの！？
May you find love!
How do I look?
Make me happy!
This, I vow!
My groom, where is he...
Heehee...
I'm Oboro of Hoshido. I've been looking forward to this for a long time!
Whoa! Don't startle me... Today of all days, I do not want to make that scary face!
What do you think of my take on bridal attire? I gave this one everything I had.
Hmm... I see a couple places where the stitches could use reinforcing. Here, and here...
A love that lasts for eternity... How wonderful. Some day, I hope to swear a solemn vow myself.
My ideal groom? Why not Lord Takumi? *mischievous laugh*
When it's your turn, I hope you'll come find me so I can tailor you the perfect wedding attire!
Of course.
A misstep...
An unbroken stitch.
